title: Gridded dataset of global radiation (PoC)
description:
Grid data on spatial values of the mean monthly distribution of global radiation over Switzerland.
"Surface Incoming Shortwave Radiation" (SIS) is the spatial mean global radiation over the whole of Switzerland. The global radiation is calculated based on data from the geostationary satellite "Meteosat Second Generation" (MSG) of MeteoSwiss.
Temporary data set for internal use only
